text:
What's wrong, Kogane?
Are you feeling hungry or something?

It's just... it's such a big place...
I was just takin' in the stage and the staff, ya know?

The costumes, the songs, the lights,
the sound system... all of it...

Everyone's workin' hard,
makin' L'Antica shine~

And with the Producer watchin' over us the whole time,
and the fans cheerin' us on...

Thanks to all sorts of things and all sorts of people,
we've made it this far...

It hits me sometimes that I'm really doin' this idol thing...
Just gets ya right in the heart, ya know?
